title: Tata Power gets LoI to acquire SPV in Odisha
description: The scope of the project involves constructing 2 x 1,500 MVA (megavolt ampere), 190 km of 765 kV (kilovolt) double circuit transmission line from the existing Angul substation to the proposed substation at Paradeep, Odisha among other project-related work
